These loafers exceeded my expectations! The material feels incredibly luxurious—soft, supple, and far more expensive than the price suggests. They pair equally well with business-casual outfits and jeans, making them versatile for any occasion.  If you're looking for loafers that combine premium quality with unbeatable comfort, these are it. Highly recommend!

评论概述: First pair of loafers I have liked
评论详情: This is the first pair of loafers I’ve purchased and liked the way they feel and look! I never buy another pair of shoes in another color, but I bought these in black too. I’m 35 and entering my first “corporate” job after being a SAHM. I worked before but fashion is wildly different these days and finding things I’m comfortable in now are rare. The brown is as shown in the pictures and I bought a size 9. I’m in between 8.5-9 usually and have a slightly wide foot, depending on the shoe. I tried them on in my carhart brand wool socks (I was lazy) and because of the thickness of my socks, they were tight-ish but still comfortable to walk around in. Will be perfect in regular dress socks or the no show kind for loafers. I tried them with paper bag pants and wide leg pants and both styles were super cute.  Give these a shot.
Super cute shoes, love the timeless style. Quality is a miss though, had them for less than 2 months and 4 wears and the sole is coming out and the heel is now loose.

I’m exchanging for a half size smaller but I am really impressed with the quality and comfort.  There was room for my bunions and I hope the size 6 accommodates them as well.I love the look of a loafer with skinny jeans and these fit the bill.The 6 fits well.  The gold accent is not my taste at all but at least it’s subtle.  I can wear these without socks which is what I planned on.  I also got the leopard pair in faux suede but the size 6 is still a tad big in those.  I have to wear a no show sock liner with them and then it fits fine.Nice padding inside is a real plus.So I wouldn’t say they are true to size as I usually wear a 6.5 and a 7 in boots to allow for socks but I’ve been noticing lately that the shoes I buy on Amazon are running a half size too big for me.  Buying shoes online is just a chance you take on finding the proper size.  Luckily, returns are fast and free on Amazon so good luck with finding your perfect shoe!

Very comfortable. Excellent price

Super cute and I got my normal size of shoe but after wearing them one time they completely stretched out like a half a size. So I did have to return them and order a half size smaller.

I won’t bother ordering a third pair and will be returning both of these.  3 stars because the shoes seemed nice, albeit huge.  It’s maybe worth mentioning that my orders arrived in different packaging, and the shoes were wrapped differently / had different paper stuffing. After seeing the second pair (in a proper shoebox and lined with paper, I believe the first pair I received may have been someone else’s return that wasn’t fully repacked before shipping.

These penny loafers by DREAM PAIRS really impressed me. They are comfortable right out of the box, and they fit my wide feet. They look really good - the easily pass for a higher price point. One is a side-by-side with my husband's Gucci loafers in black. Sure there are subtle differences, but overall this pair is actually a dream.
